name: Hallway of Timid Agility
description:
Conquer the hallway of timid agility while defending yourself or running away from the ghosts that inhabit the area. 

Controls

W,S,A,D or arrow key: Moves your Player

A Key or D Key or Left Arrow Key or Right Arrow Key while holding LeftShift: makes your Player run

Space Bar: makes your character jump, press it again to double jump

E key: shoots a projectile
